ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
ygData.msgSnippet: Ah. Clarity=higher levels. When you have augmentation which is 1) faster and 2) longer laster (and 3) has more effects than haste only so is a good choice for
ygData.messageBody:
Ah. Clarity=higher levels. When you have augmentation which is
1) faster and 2) longer laster (and 3) has more effects than haste
only so is a good choice for buffs). Though I hope he is casting Clarity
on your clerics as well :)

Unfortunately, bards seem to get fewer really useful songs at those levels
than
in lower ones :(


>-----Original Message-----
>From: Kimes, Dean W. [mailto:dean_kimes@...]
>Sent: Wednesday, May 03, 2000 12:49 PM
>To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
>Subject: RE: [eqbards] Chant of Battle problems
>
>
>I tried. He has clarity now and so can usually handle the mana no problem.
>He ends up most fights with 6+ mobs at 40% mana while the clerics are
>medding during the end of the fight. He basically meds thru the fight and
>pops up when things un-mez.
>
>My Anthem is no where near as good as his haste buffs anyhow. The one time
>we tried it, the other two tanks complained about being slow.
